Package clientGUIControllers

Class DefineThresholdLevelController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.DefineThresholdLevelController
public class DefineThresholdLevelController extends Object
This department gives the option to let the area manager change the threshold level of each product in the facility located in the area he is responsible for. It will use the details of the area manager - which facilities exist for his area, and information about all the products in each facility.
